channel.title: Dalton Amateur Radio Club
channel.description: Seeking to advance the state of art and science of amateur radio communications through education, training, experimentation, and research. Promoting the free interchange of technical information among and between amateur radio operators and the general public.

item.title: DARC Christmas Party
item.description:
Dalton Western Sizzlin 501 Legion Dr, Dalton, Georgia 30721

Annual DARC Christmas Party. Also good time to pay your $12/year dues. :)
